column2: "Yo, <%me>. Have you gotten used to fighting?"
"What class are you again? Oh that's right, you can pretty much manage anything."
"Being able to change your own photon specialization seems convenient."
"<%me>, from your perspective, which class do I look like?"
"A hunter, right? But my photon specialization is actually better suited towards ranger."
"Right now, I'm forcing myself to be a hunter, but it's hard being a class that doesn't suit you."
"Being able to choose what you want to be is really enviable."
"I guess there's no use in dwelling on what I can't do. I just have to focus on what I can."

"Go back to being a ranger?
I'd like to."
"But there's someone I have to protect. And that's why I have to stick with being a hunter."
"Sorry, I don't know why, but when I talk to you, I tend to get really off the subject."
"There's just a familiar feeling about you..."
